text: \f + \fr 64:1 \ft \xt Isaiah 64:1 \ft in the English Bible begins here. In the Hebrew Bible, 63:19 continues \f* Would that you would tear \add the\add* heavens \add and\add* come down;
\add the\add* mountains would quake before you,
\f + \fr 64:2 \ft \xt Isaiah 64:2–12 \ft in the English Bible is 64:1–11 in the Hebrew Bible \f* as fire kindles brushwood,
\add the\add* fire causes water to boil,
to make your name known to your adversaries,
\add that the\add* nations might tremble from your ⸤presence⸥.\f + \fr 64:2 \ft Literally “face” \f*
When you did terrible deeds \add which\add* we did not ⸤expect⸥,\f + \fr 64:3 \ft Literally “await” \f* you came down;
\add the\add* mountains quaked because of your ⸤presence⸥.\f + \fr 64:3 \ft Literally “face” \f*
And since ancient \add times\add* they have not heard,
have not listened,
no eye has seen a God except you;
he ⸤acts⸥\f + \fr 64:4 \ft Literally “makes” \f* for the one who waits for him.
You meet with the one who rejoices,
one who does righteousness.
In your ways they remember you.
Look! You were angry and we sinned against them \add in\add* ancient \add times\add* and we were saved.
And we all have become like the unclean,
and all our deeds of justice like a menstrual cloth,
And we all wither like \add a\add* leaf,
and our iniquities take us away like the wind.
And there is no one who calls on your name,
who pulls himself up to keep hold of you,
for you have hidden your face from us,\f + \fr 64:7 \ft Or “him” \f*
and melted us into the hand of our iniquity.
Yet now Yahweh, you \add are\add* our father;
we \add are\add* the clay and you \add are\add* our ⸤potter⸥,\f + \fr 64:8 \ft Literally “one who fashions” \f*
and we all \add are\add* the work of your hand.
You must not be exceedingly angry, Yahweh,
and you must not remember iniquity forever!
Look! Behold, now! We all \add are\add* your people!
⸤Your holy cities⸥\f + \fr 64:10 \ft Literally “The cities of your holiness” \f* have become a wilderness;
Zion has become a wilderness, Jerusalem a desolation.

⸤Our holy and beautiful temple⸥,\f + \fr 64:11 \ft Literally “the house of our holiness and our beauty” \f* where our ancestors\f + \fr 64:11 \ft Or “fathers” \f* praised you has ⸤been burned⸥\f + \fr 64:11 \ft Literally “been for burning” \f* \add by\add* fire,
and all our precious objects have become ruins.\f + \fr 64:11 \ft Hebrew “ruin” \f*
Will you control yourself because of these, Yahweh?
Will you be silent?
And will you oppress us exceedingly?
